title: Head offices; management consultancy (PKD 70)
paragraphs: Strategic management and coordination of international transport projects.
Advisory services based on the experience of the CEO & Founder in cross-border logistics.
Possibility to support partners and clients in planning efficient transport chains.
points: High-level planning of routes between the EU, Middle East and Central Asia.
Consulting for cost optimisation, risk management and safety in international road transport.
Preparation of concepts for new logistics projects and investment plans.
